Info

Defineds class ProgressBar with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a progressbar as part of splash screen.

class ats_utilities.splash.progress_bar.ProgressBar(end: int, start: int = 0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defineds class ProgressBar with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a progressbar as part of splash screen. Progress bar component.

It defines:

attributes:
DEFAULT_BAR_LENGTH - Length of progressbar.
DEFAULT_CHAR_ON - Loaded progress element.
DEFAULT_CHAR_OFF - Unloaded progress element.
_start - Start of level.
_end - End of level.
_bar_length - Progress length.
_level - Progress level.
_plotted - Plotted progress.
_level_chars - Level progress chars.
methods:
__init__ - Initials ProgressBar constructor.
set_level - Sets level of progress.
plot_progress - Plots progress.
set_and_plot - Sets and plots progress.
__del__ - Dunder del method for ProgressBar.
DEFAULT_BAR_LENGTH: int = 60¶
DEFAULT_CHAR_OFF: str = ' '¶
DEFAULT_CHAR_ON: str = '█'¶
plot_progress(columns: int) → None[source]¶

Plots progress.

Parameters:

columns (<int>) – Colums for open console session

Exceptions:

None

set_and_plot(level: int, columns: int) → None[source]¶

Sets and plots progress.

Parameters:

  • level (<int>) – Level of progress

  • columns (<int>) – colums for open console session

Exceptions:

None

set_level(level: int) → None[source]¶

Sets level.

Parameters:

level (<int>) – Level of progress

Exceptions:

None
